sentences.sentence: Such escapes, such disguises such subterfuges, and all so cleverly planned and carried out!
sentences.translation: 这一切的逃脱、伪装和诡计都是这样巧妙地策划和实施的！

sentences.sentence: Being mentally immature and sociably inexperienced, many of youngsters are easy to be deceived by subterfuges.
sentences.translation: 由于心理上的不成熟和社会经验的缺乏，一些年轻人很容易被假话欺骗。鄡。

sentences.sentence: To resort to tricks or subterfuges; use chicanery.
sentences.translation: 对…施用诡计或玩花招；用圈套。
